channel.description: Recent content in Software Engineering on Mikaël Gibert

item.title: The Backbone of Distributed Computing: Consensus and Federation protocols
item.description: Explore the key differences between consensus and federation protocols in distributed computing. Learn how leader-based, gossip-based, and federated architectures enable coordination across databases, messaging systems, and IoT networks.
